title: Sorry I didn't get that - on long press centre button on pixel 3 USB type c headphones. Kindly help
content:
Whenever I long press centre black button on type c headphones ( received with phone ) , I get error - Sorry I didn't get that. 

Headphones are connected to pixel 3 device. 

Kindly help in this matter since I am unable to use Google assistant features through headphones while driving
